Uses of Class
t4.NeuralNet.Activation.ActivationFunction

  • Packages that use ActivationFunction 
    Package Description
    t4.NeuralNet  
    t4.NeuralNet.Activation  

    • Uses of ActivationFunction in t4.NeuralNet

      Fields in t4.NeuralNet declared as ActivationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ActivationFunction NeuralNet.activation 
      Methods in t4.NeuralNet with parameters of type ActivationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Neuron.backpropagate(double alpha, double f, double d, double payoff, ActivationFunction func)
      Update the values of the weights for the input Bridges connected to this Neuron using the following function:

      w = w + alpha * (d - f) * a' * x

      Where:
      -w is the current weight
      -alpha is the learning rate
      -d is the desired output
      -f is the observed output
      -a' is the derivative of the activation function
      -x is the input value to the bridge's weight
      protected double Neuron.calculateValue(ActivationFunction func)
      Update the value of the Neuron to be the weighted sum of the Neurons linked via the input Bridges.
      double Neuron.getOutput(ActivationFunction func)
      Computes the output from this Neuron using the given activation function
      protected double Bridge.getWeightedInput(ActivationFunction func)
      Calculates the weighted input of the Neuron for this Bridge.
      Constructors in t4.NeuralNet with parameters of type ActivationFunction 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuralNet(ActivationFunction activation)
      Constructs a new NeuralNet object with the given activation function.
      NeuralNet(ActivationFunction activation, double alpha)
      Constructs a new NeuralNet object with the given activation function and learning rate.
      NeuralNet(ActivationFunction activation, double alpha, double bias)
      Constructs a new NeuralNet object with the given activation function, learning rate, and bias value.

    • Uses of ActivationFunction in t4.NeuralNet.Activation

      Subclasses of ActivationFunction in t4.NeuralNet.Activation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sigmoid
      A Sigmoid ActivationFunction is a function that takes values and returns a value in the range [0, 1].
      class  Tanh
      A Sigmoid ActivationFunction is a function that takes values and returns a value in the range [-1, 1].
      class  Threshold
      A Threshold ActivationFunction is a simple function that returns 1 if the input is above a specific value, otherwise it returns 0.
